name: TNEA 2020 - Tamilnadu Engineering Counselling
description: TNEA 2020 - Tamilnadu Engineering Colleges is a smart college search assistant app which provides a local search for different colleges and their respective services. It is a unique platform for one to discover colleges that are best suited to pursue their career, to opt for academic courses and to stay updated on trending skills.   We as a community, simplify the college selection and admission process by making it easy to find the most suitable colleges and universities with details on courses, fees, placement, faculty and more.   The KalviApp community welcomes you to join hands and help us in providing the most accurate information to the mass. Please feel free to fill in the below form for any missing information about your institution and take part in the cause of bringing in transparency in the education search.  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfxZ1bkgWjfcyzJ-t3NwLkpWoo0UiwnEEORMtbT_aOFWZ5SRA/viewform?usp=sf_link   Please explore the App yourselves to get the first-hand experience.  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.kalviapp.tamilnaduengineeringcolleges https://kalviapp.com/  Kindly reach us if you need any more additional details. KalviApp@gmail.com
